title: Twitter's Advertising Exodus Accelerates, Despite Outreach From Elon Musk
description: Ad giant Omnicom joins other agencies in recommending brands pause spending, and some companies halt discussions for annual contracts.

title: When Parents Live-Text the Playdate: Endearing or Annoying?
description: The pressure on moms to be perfect often results in a string of kid photos arriving in real time.

title: FTX Is Investigating a Potential Hack Amid Bankruptcy Filing
description: More than $400 million worth of crypto funds appears to be missing, according to a crypto analytics firm.

title: Did a Robot Write This?
description: Not this time, but unbeknownst to most people, AI is churning out articles, illustrations, fake product reviews and even short videos.
